Translations.Text: satkarmavannu madidavanu visvasiyagiddare avana sramavu vyarthavagadu. Navu ellavannu dakhalisiduttiddeve
navu nasapadisiruva nadugala janaru marali baralararu –
ya'ajuj mattu ma'ajuj‌galu bidugadegondu ella dinnegalinda ilidu baruva tanaka

khacita vagdanada samayavu (punarut'thana dinavu) hattira bandaga, dhikkarigala kannugalu digbhramegolluvavu. ‘‘Ayyo nam'ma dusthiti! I kuritu navu nirlaksadalliddevu. Nijakku navu akramigalagiddevu’’ (endu avaru heluvaru)
khanditavagiyu nivu hagu allahanannu bittu nivu pujisuttidda vastugalella narakada indhanagalu. Nivu adarolage hoguviri
avugalella nijakku devarugalagiddare adarolage hoguttiralilla. Avu sadakala alle iruvavu
alli (narakadalli) avara ciratave merediruvudu. Avarige adaralli berenu kelisadu
atta, nam'ma kadeyinda yara paravagi hitada nirdharavagiruvudo avarannu adarinda (narakadinda) duravidalaguvudu
adara sappala kuda avarige kelisadu. Avaru tamagistaviruvalli sadakala iruvaru
(Andina) maha cinteyu avarannu kadadu mattu ‘‘iduve nimage vagdana madalagidda dina’’ ennutta malak‌galu avarannu svagatisuvaru

andu navu kagadada putagalannu madacidante akasavannu madaci biduvevu. Navu prathama bari srstisidanteye a (srsti) karyavannu punaravartisuvevu. Idu nam'ma kartavyavagiruva vagdana. Navu khandita adannu madiye biduvevu
